abstract: E.L. James announced Monday that she would publish a 576-page story, written from the point of view of the billionaire Christian Grey.

headline.main: ‘Fifty Shades’ Author to Offer Grey’s Perspective
headline.print_headline: Another Shade of ‘Grey’ From E.L. James

snippet: E.L. James announced Monday that she would publish a 576-page story, written from the point of view of the billionaire Christian Grey.
